Producer: Jeff Tremaine, Spike Jonze, Johnny Knoxville
Screenwriter: Jeff Tremaine, Spike Jonze, Johnny Knoxville
Production Co: MTV Networks, Paramount Pictures, Dickhouse Productions, MTV Films, Lynch Siderow Productions Inc.
Sound Mix: Surround, Dolby SR, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Dolby Stereo
Synopsis: In this comedic documentary, Johnny Knoxville heads a crew of stuntmen, skateboarders and all-around lunatics as they prank, embarrass and torture each other in the name of fun. The antics range from childlike -- the boys don panda suits for a romp through Tokyo -- to grotesque and life-threatening. A golf cart demolition derby turns downright dangerous. Live gators nearly chomp maniac Steve-O. Filmmaker Spike Jonze and Knoxville, in heavy makeup, test the public's patience for the elderly.
Title: Jackass: The Movie
